basics.name: Joe Najm
basics.label: Engineer
basics.summary: Just an engineer passionnate about Machine Learning, Computer Vision and Data Science

work.name: Alfa Romeo/Stake Sauber Formula One Team
work.summary: Automatic extraction of trajectory information from on-board F1 footage using Deep networks and Visual SLAM

work.name: Medical Image Analysis Lab (CHUV, Lausanne)
work.summary: Trained and deployed deep models for the detection of lesions in brain MRI images. Developed a software to make the network easily accessible to clinicians using docker (available in projects section)

volunteer.name: EPFL Racing Team
volunteer.summary: Automatic detection and distance estimation of objects in realtime with a LiDAR and monocular camera, using machine learning methods

education.area: Electrical Engineering, specialization: signal, image and video porcessing

publications.name: Streamline RimNet: Tools for Automatic Classification of Paramagnetic Rim Lesions in MRI of Multiple Sclerosis
publications.summary: Software to deploy the RimNet deep network to clinicians, where they would only need to click on a potential lesion to extract a patch and run the network in realtime on it using docker, and receive instantaneously a feedback

projects.name: Automatic Extraction of Yaw Rate and Velocity from on-board Formula One footage
projects.summary: Automatically extract trajectory information such as veloicty and yaw rate from the on-board footage, using Visual SLAM and Deep Networks

projects.name: EPFL Racing Team Driverless perception
projects.summary: Detection and distance estimation of objects in realtime for a self-driving car, with a monocular camera and a LiDAR, using artificial intelligence

projects.name: Streamline RimNet: Tools for Automatic Classification of Paramagnetic Rim Lesions in MRI of Multiple Sclerosis
projects.summary: Tool to deploy a deep network called RimNet

projects.name: Android application: GymRat
projects.summary: Free and opensource android application written in kotlin to track exercises at the gym, as well as the bodyweight, calories and protein

projects.name: Android application: MyMeds
projects.summary: Free and opensource android application written in kotlin compose to track available medications at home, expiry date and category

projects.name: ApiZoom – deep learning to quantify the Varroa parasite in honey bee hive images
projects.summary: Bachelor project: detect and count number of toxic varroa mites in honey bee hive images, among other available debris. These mites are a leading cause of death in the bee community and hives require treatment when reaching a certain varroa threshold.
